name: Oceans 494
description:
I've been working on this since the first lecture and I've been working hard to get it out while its topical.

I'd like to clarify that I had the idea and started working on the design BEFORE we were shown a showcase game with a similar premise.

Happily accepting feedback and bug reports, but don't hold your breath for updates.

Obviously, not the prettiest looking, just a meme with some fun levels.

Feel free to look at the code, or whatever you want to do with it. If you're high enough to make your own levels, be my guest, I'll write you documentation.

Thanks!
